description: The PB_TX_SET_PLAN_GRP table lists employer groups associated with a premium billing payment transaction set.

columns.name: PB_TXSET_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing transaction set.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line counter for the plan group on the transaction set.

columns.name: PLAN_GRP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the plan group associated with the transaction set.

columns.name: PLAN_GRP_ID_PLAN_GRP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the employer group record
